text: John M. Essigman is an American chemist, currently the William R. & Betsy P. Leitch Professor in Residence of Chemistry, Toxicology, and Biological Engineering at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:21st-century American chemists Category:Northeastern University alumni Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni
title: John Essigmann
